block.p: DONELIAN-Avedis. Of Hackensack, NJ, age 87. Husband of the late Armine (nee Bagdasarian). Father of Donna Hortian, Dicran and Stephen Donelian. Visiting Tuesday, 3-5 and 7-9 PM, at St. Leon Armenian Church, 12-61 Saddle River Rd., Fair Lawn, NJ. Religious service Wednesday, 11 AM. Interment following, Ferncliff Cemetery, Ferncliff, NY. For information contact Frank Patti and Kenneth Mikatarian Funeral Directors, 201-944-0100.
